first victory: The first victory is the sweetest of all
8th victory: The secret of life, though, is to fall seven times and to get up eight times.
10th victory: Ten is not just a number; it's a symbol of completeness, perfection, and a fresh start.
reached student tier: The egg is the world. Who would be born must first destroy a world.
reached bachelor tier: Best of all among peers. Now it is time to go out to the world.
reached master tier: That which is done out of love always takes place beyond good and evil.
reached doctor tier: The one who mastered pong. The one who mastered life.
